instruction: Summarize the article about learning from failure.
input:
article

Failure can be an important part of learning and growth. As humans, we often learn more from our mistakes and shortcomings than from our successes. We often grow as we reflect on our shortcomings and become better as a result. Failing at tasks can also help us to remind us to think outside the box and take on new challenges.
output: Failure can be an invaluable part of learning and personal growth, as it helps us to reflect on our shortcomings and become better as a result. It also encourages us to think outside the box and take on new challenges, making it an essential element of success.
